WorkOrder.description: The work order associated with the diagnosis.

WorkOrderLineItem.description: The work order line item associated with the diagnosis.

FaultCode.description: The fault code associated with the asset or product.

CausalPart.description: The part of the asset or product causing the fault.

Diagnosis.description: The details of the fault or issue that's being diagnosed.

Solution.description: The details about the solution to fix the fault.
